properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 1 at 2:09AM PST until February 2 at 1:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 10 to 15 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 20 to
25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 8 to 10 feet at 13
seconds expected. For the Storm Watch, northwest winds 30 to
40 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and seas 12 to 17 feet at 13
seconds possible.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 1 PM PST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 3 AM PST
Sunday. For the Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through
Sunday evening.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare to remain in port, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions before conditions
deteriorate.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... ...STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
